question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. "Do not block" sign
B. NBA 2K10 advertisement board
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The "Do not block" sign is on a pole in the foreground, while the NBA 2K10 advertisement board is on a distant building, making the depth relationship very obvious.
